Name: oid
column6: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: puballtables
column6: if true, this publication automatically includes all tables in the database, including any that will be created in the future.

Name: pubinsert
column6: if true, insert operations are replicated for tables in the publication.

Name: pubupdate
column6: if true, update operations are replicated for tables in the publication.

Name: pubdelete
column6: if true, delete operations are replicated for tables in the publication.

Name: pubtruncate
column6: if true, truncate operations are replicated for tables in the publication.
